title: Start
body:
<<detachFrom Renata Mia>>
<<disableCollisions Renata>>
<<moveToX Renata ItemSeller 20 40>>
<<moveToY Renata ItemSeller -10 40>>
<<faceUp Renata>>
ItemSeller: I've got your items right here!
<<faceUp ItemSeller>>
ItemSeller: Medicines!
<<faceDown ItemSeller>>
ItemSeller: Antidotes!
<<faceUp ItemSeller>>
ItemSeller: And some blue stuff!
<<faceDown ItemSeller>>
Renata: Blue stuff?
Mia: Why don't you know what it is?
ItemSeller: I can't remember what evvvv-erything is. I've got a lot of stuff in this shop!
[[ Medicine |nomoney]]
[[ Antidote |nomoney]]
[[ Blue stuff |nomoney]]

title: nomoney
body:
ItemSeller: That'll be 100 potch.
Renata: 100 potch? Who has that kind of money?
ItemSeller: People who go around fighting monsters, I guess.
Renata: Do you get a lot of those around here?
ItemSeller: We do, actually.
ItemSeller: A lady actually came through earlier today and bought a bunch. She had a huge scythe, looked like she meant business.
ItemSeller: She even bought some of the blue stuff, come to think of it.
ItemSeller: Anyways, I probably shouldn't be selling these to kids.
Mia: We're off to get some food anyway.
ItemSeller: The rolls at the bakery are great today!
<<attachTo Renata Mia>>
[[end]]
